wines.description: A 2003 wine from California, showcasing refreshing fruit and elegant balance. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Delicate aromas of strawberry and raspberry open the bouquet, with subtle floral notes. Fresh and inviting aromatic profile.
tastingNotes.palate: Bright red berry flavors balanced by crisp acidity. Refreshing and food-friendly with elegant texture.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with lingering red berry notes. Perfect for warm weather.

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026; best enjoyed young

tastingNotes.aroma: Delicate aromas of strawberry and raspberry open the bouquet, with subtle floral notes. Fresh and inviting aromatic profile.

wines.description: A 2018 wine from California, showcasing crisp acidity and vibrant aromatics. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright aromas of lime and citrus lead the nose, accented by jasmine. Underlying chalk adds terroir complexity. The profile is fresh, vibrant, and inviting.
tastingNotes.palate: Crisp acidity provides excellent structure, supporting flavors of green apple, pear, and white peach. The mid-palate shows acacia and subtle sea spray. Medium-bodied with good concentration and balance.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean and persistent finish with citrus and mineral notes. Bright acidity leaves the palate refreshed. Excellent length and purity.

foodPairings: Fresh oysters on the half shell

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2026; best enjoyed young

wines.productName: Stel + Mar Cabernet Sauvignon (DC, MD, and Southern VA Only) 2022
wines.description: A 2022 wine from California, showcasing bold fruit character and structured tannins. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: The bouquet reveals concentrated aromas of dark cherry and plum, complemented by notes of cinnamon and tobacco. Additional layers of vanilla and oak-derived graphite add complexity. The nose is intense yet refined, showing excellent concentration.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, flavors of cassis and blackcurrant dominate, supported by well-integrated tannins. The mid-palate reveals clove, truffle, and subtle oak. Balanced acidity provides freshness while the texture is smooth and velvety. The wine shows impressive depth and complexity.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and persistent, with blueberry flavors lingering alongside cedar. Refined tannins suggest good aging potential. The aftertaste is memorable and complex.

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs in wine reduction

servingInfo.decanting: Decant for 30-60 minutes to open aromatics

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030; can age 5-10 years

wines.description: A 2019 wine from Napa Valley, California, showcasing bold fruit character and structured tannins. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: The bouquet reveals concentrated aromas of plum and cassis, complemented by notes of clove and graphite. Additional layers of cedar and oak-derived truffle add complexity. The nose is intense yet refined, showing excellent concentration.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, flavors of blackcurrant and blueberry dominate, supported by well-integrated tannins. The mid-palate reveals vanilla, forest floor, and subtle oak. Balanced acidity provides freshness while the texture is smooth and velvety. The wine shows impressive depth and complexity.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and persistent, with black raspberry flavors lingering alongside nutmeg. Refined tannins suggest good aging potential. The aftertaste is memorable and complex.

wines.description: A 2022 wine from California, showcasing crisp acidity and vibrant aromatics. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright aromas of white peach and melon lead the nose, accented by honeysuckle. Underlying flint adds terroir complexity. The profile is fresh, vibrant, and inviting.
tastingNotes.palate: Crisp acidity provides excellent structure, supporting flavors of lemon zest, lime, and citrus. The mid-palate shows jasmine and subtle chalk. Medium-bodied with good concentration and balance.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean and persistent finish with citrus and mineral notes. Bright acidity leaves the palate refreshed. Excellent length and purity.

wines.description: A 2017 wine from California, showcasing bold fruit character and structured tannins. This wine represents quality winemaking and terroir expression, offering exceptional drinking pleasure.

tastingNotes.aroma: The bouquet reveals concentrated aromas of black raspberry and blackberry, complemented by notes of star anise and espresso. Additional layers of cinnamon and oak-derived leather add complexity. The nose is intense yet refined, showing excellent concentration.
tastingNotes.palate: On the palate, flavors of dark cherry and plum dominate, supported by well-integrated tannins. The mid-palate reveals black pepper, tobacco, and subtle oak. Balanced acidity provides freshness while the texture is smooth and velvety. The wine shows impressive depth and complexity.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and persistent, with cassis flavors lingering alongside clove. Refined tannins suggest good aging potential. The aftertaste is memorable and complex.
